phrs.translation: 纽黑文市（美国康涅狄格州港市）
避税场所（税率很低的国家或地区）

sentences.sentence: Forest stands of red oaks, with their tannin-rich foliage, may even provide caterpillars with safe havens from disease.
sentences.translation: 红栎树的林分枝的叶子富含鞣酸，甚至可以为毛毛虫提供远离疾病的安全避难所。

sentences.sentence: Countries overwhelmed by the human tide of refugees want safe havens set up at once.
sentences.translation: 那些被难民潮席卷的国家想要立即建立安全区。

sentences.sentence: Thus Banks will always be safe havens.
sentences.translation: 这样银行将一直处于安全的避风港内。
